column1: #Text=Main Asami Sato Bolin Bumi Korra Kya Mako Tenzin Antagonists Dark spirits Desna and Eska Unalaq Vaatu says : " Minor Katara Naga Oogi Pabu Senna Tonraq " Shiro Shinobi says : " After ten thousand years , Harmonic Convergence is here again , and the dark spirit Vaatu is free .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not going to let you fuse with Unalaq .
#Text=You 're going right back in that prison .
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't let Unalaq back in the Spirit World .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Ah , this is n't working .
#Text=We ca n't just randomly wander the Spirit World , call out for Jinora , and expect to find her .
#Text=" Bumi says : " We just need to employ the simply rules of tracking .
#Text=First we locate her footprints ... then we follow them .
#Text=" Kya says : " Do you even know what spirit footprints look like ?
#Text=Face it , your tracking skills wo n't work in the Spirit World .
#Text=I feel a lot of spiritual energy coming from that direction .
#Text=" Bumi says : " We 're in the Spirit World .
#Text=We ca n't do this by ourselves .
#Text=I 'm sorry to disturb you , but I am in need of your assistance .
#Text=" Dark Spider Spirit says : " You dare wake me , human ?
#Text=Humans in the Spirit World belong in one place only .
#Text=" Bumi says : " Well , that did n't work .
